name: .SALL
summary: Learn about .SALL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a SALL file, view the backup settings it contains, and use it to perform a backup operation in SimplySync Backup (Windows). To do so, either drag your SALL file to the SimplySync Backup icon or desktop shortcut, or open the program and select the Open button.
